name: Mad Quad
description: MAD QUAD is both exciting and quite difficult arcade the gameplay of which focuses not only on jumping at platforms but on skillful interaction with physics. Remember that if you cube rolls over in the flight, your game view will literally roll over too.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
